pr_title: Null Pointer when right-clicking on graph

timeline.bodyText:
This may have been between the time I was developing the context menu and the SonarQube fixes were added in.
My mistake in not remaining consistent and returning an empty list in this case. Great pickup @formalhaut69
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

replies.bodyText: All good @aldebaran30701  and thanks for fixing it @formalhaut69 !
replies.author: arcturus2
